document_data.name: Corpse Rose
document_data.mainbody: '''Corpse rose''' was a grim plant that flowered where the dead rested. Some of these flowers were found in the [[Western Heartlands]] and in the graveyard of the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]].

Description.Usages: Corpse roses were a valuable and extremely rare [[alchemical]] ingredient. These flowers were dried and ground along with [[salt]]s that enchanted their properties. Salts of corpse roses could be mixed with certain types of alchemical suspensions to brew a powerful [[poison]] called ''[[Thisobald's brewed-up Bellyglummer]]''.
